titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Elisha Hedden, Indictment
CWG6955

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Spencer Circuit Court
September Term A D 1865
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
against
Elisha Hedden

The Grand Jury of Spencer County in the name and by the Authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky Accuse Elisha Hedden of the Crime of Robbery Committed as follows The said Elisha Hedden in the aforesaid Spencer County on the day of September A D 1864 wilfully wickedy feloniously and of his malice aforethought by violence did take and Carry away One double barelled shot gun worth thirty Dollars and one revolving pistol worth twenty Dollars the property of Anderson Rice from the possession presence and Custody of the Said Rice against his will and consent & by putting the said Rice in great fear of Some Serious & immediate injury to his life and limb & liberty at the hands of the Said Hedden against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

Oliver Tichener
Anderson Rice
Thos Tichener
J T. Rice

A Copy Test
Thos J Barker clk

Commonwealth of Ky
vs } Indictment
Elisha Hedden
copied for wife fee 23 cts
Test Thos J Barker clk
2
